搩字的基本解释

搩
jié
强暴。
古同“揭”，担负。

搩
zhé
张开（拇指、中指或食指）度量物体：“等闲搩手量青天，枉把虚空记寻尺。”

搩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》渠列切，入薛，羣。］
(1)担；负。
(2)挟持；抱持。
[②]［zhǎ］
［《集韻》陟格切，入陌，知。］
以手度物。

搩字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　搩； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页447第25
【唐韻】渠列切【集韻】【韻會】巨列切，?音傑。與揭同。見揭字註。　又【集韻】陟格切，音磔。手度物也。或作?。互見?字註。

搩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
搩字的起名意思

暂无。

Squeeze
Basic explanation of words
Squeeze
jié
Rape.
Gu Tong "revealed" and shouldered the responsibility.
Squeeze
zhé
Open (thumb, middle finger or index finger) to measure the object: "Wait for a while and hold your hand to measure the blue sky, and record the void in vain to find the ruler."
Squeeze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guang Yun" Qu Lie cut, into Xue, group. ]
(1) Responsibility; burden.
(2) Holding; holding.
[②]［zhǎ］
["Jiyun" Zhige cut, enter the Mo, know. ]
Measure things by hand.
Squeeze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　搩; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 447-25
[Tang Yun] Qu Lieqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ju Lieqie,? Yinjie. Same as Jie. See the explanatory note.　 [Ji Yun] Zhi Geqi, Yin Beng. Hand measure things too. Or for?. See each other? Note.
Squeeze
